item.title: Banning host
item.dc:creator: @ryan_justin ryan justin
item.description:
@ryan_justin wrote:

sometimes on my server i will log out and then back in but it will say error connecting to server and say banning host 127.0.0.1 for flooding

so i looked it up in server.java and theres some delays(ill post the code) and i would like to know what to set those to so that theres

more time before it thinks im flooding

public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println(“BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)”);
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}

Read full topic
